DataParamLine - Class in sim
DataParamLine displays a Parameter associated with a DataAnalyser object.
DataParamLine(Parameter, int) - Constructor for class sim.DataParamLine
Creates a DataParamLine given a Parameter (which must be one of the xDataParameter types, where x is Int, Double, Color etc.), and a width.
DataParamPanel - Class in sim
DataParamPanel extends ParamPanel to provide a JPanel displaying the Parameters of a DataAnalyser, which are dynamic during running of the simulation.
DataParamPanel(Parameter[]) - Constructor for class sim.DataParamPanel
Creates a new DataParamPanel given an array of Parameters.

DOUBLE - Static variable in class sim.Parameter
 
DoubleDataParameter - Class in sim
DoubleDataParameter extends DataParameter to implement functionality to display a DoubleParameter within a GUI.
DoubleDataParameter(String, double, boolean) - Constructor for class sim.DoubleDataParameter
Creates a DoubleDataParameter given a name, value and a boolean value to indicate whether or not the parameter is adjustable during running of the simulation using it.
DoubleParameter - Class in sim
DoubleParameter extends Parameter to implement functionality to store a parameter whose value is a double.
DoubleParameter(String, double, boolean) - Constructor for class sim.DoubleParameter
Creates a DoubleParameter given a name, value and a boolean value to indicate whether or not the parameter is adjustable during running of the simulation using it.
DoubleSimParameter - Class in sim
DoubleSimParameter extends DoubleParameter to implement a DoubleParameter with minimum and maximum values.
DoubleSimParameter(String, double, double, double, boolean) - Constructor for class sim.DoubleSimParameter
